an8.23:1.1: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā āḷaviyaṁ viharati aggāḷave cetiye.
an8.23:1.3: “sattahi, bhikkhave, acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannāgataṁ hatthakaṁ āḷavakaṁ dhāretha.
an8.23:1.12: imehi kho, bhikkhave, sattahi acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannāgataṁ hatthakaṁ āḷavakaṁ dhārethā”ti.
an8.23:1.14: Idaṁ vatvāna sugato uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṁ pāvisi.
an8.23:2.1: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena hatthakassa āḷavakassa nivesanaṁ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
an8.23:2.2: Atha kho hatthako āḷavako yena so bhikkhu tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā taṁ bhikkhuṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho hatthakaṁ āḷavakaṁ so bhikkhu etadavoca:
an8.23:3.1: “Sattahi kho tvaṁ, āvuso, acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannāgato bhagavatā byākato.
an8.23:3.10: Imehi kho tvaṁ, āvuso, sattahi acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannāgato bhagavatā byākato”ti.
an8.23:3.11: “Kaccittha, bhante, na koci gihī ahosi odātavasano”ti?
an8.23:3.12: “Na hettha, āvuso, koci gihī ahosi odātavasano”ti.
an8.23:3.13: “Sādhu, bhante, yadettha na koci gihī ahosi odātavasano”ti.
an8.23:4.1: Atha kho so bhikkhu hatthakassa āḷavakassa nivesane piṇḍapātaṁ gahetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
an8.23:4.2: Atha kho so bhikkhu pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an8.23:5.1: “Idhāhaṁ, bhante, pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena hatthakassa āḷavakassa nivesanaṁ tenupasaṅkamiṁ; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdiṁ.
an8.23:5.2: Atha kho, bhante, hatthako āḷavako yenāhaṁ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā maṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
an8.23:5.3: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhante, hatthakaṁ āḷavakaṁ etadavacaṁ:
an8.23:5.4: ‘sattahi kho tvaṁ, āvuso, acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannāgato bhagavatā byākato.
an8.23:5.13: Imehi kho tvaṁ, āvuso, sattahi acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannāgato bhagavatā byākato’ti.
an8.23:6.1: Evaṁ vutte, bhante, hatthako maṁ etadavoca:
an8.23:6.2: ‘kaccittha, bhante, na koci gihī ahosi odātavasano’ti?
an8.23:6.3: ‘Na hettha, āvuso, koci gihī ahosi odātavasano’ti.
an8.23:6.4: ‘Sādhu, bhante, yadettha na koci gihī ahosi odātavasano’”ti.
an8.23:7.3: Santeyeva attani kusaladhamme na icchati parehi ñāyamāne.
an8.23:7.4: Tena hi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, imināpi aṭṭhamena acchariyena abbhutena dhammena samannāgataṁ hatthakaṁ āḷavakaṁ dhārehi, yadidaṁ appicchatāyā”ti.
